DOC.brief_summary: This randomize placebo control clinical trial design investigate effect micronized fenofibrate fast postprandial lipoprotein , oxidize fatty acid lipoprotein , inflammatory mediator thrombotic factor among hypertriglyceridemic individual two characteristic metabolic syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Micronized Fenofibrate Fasting Postprandial Lipoproteins , Inflammatory Mediators Thrombosis
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study determine effect micronized fenofibrate ( 160 mg/daily ) : 1 . Fasting postprandial lipid lipoproteins standarized test meal . 2 . Fasting postprandial oxidize fatty acid oxidize low density lipoprotein standarized test meal . 3 . Fasting postprandial inflammatory mediator standarized test meal . 4 . Fasting postprandial lipopolysaccharide-stimulated cytokine production standarized test meal . 5 . Fasting postprandial marker hemostasis , fibrinolysis blood viscosity standarized test meal .
DOC.criteria: 1. male postmenopausal females 18 year age fast triglyceride great equal 1.7 mmol/L < 6.9 mmol/L 2. two follow Adult Treatment Panel III ( 1 ) criterion metabolic syndrome : abdominal obesity ( waist circumference > 89 cm female > 102 cm male ) ; low highdensity lipoprotein cholesterol ( HDLC ) ( < 1.3 mmol/L woman < 1.0 mmol/L men ) ; hypertension ( systolic blood pressure > 130 diastolic blood pressure > 85 mm Hg ) current drug therapy hypertension ; impaired fasting glucose ( 6.1 mmol/L 7.0 mmol/L ) . 1. include type 1 2 diabetes 2 . Body mass index > 40 kg/m2 3 . Use lipidlowering therapy 4 . Oral hypoglycemic therapy 5 . Insulin 6 . Aspirin > 81 mg daily 7 . Regular use nonsteroidal antiinflammatory agent cyclooxygenase2 inhibitor , corticosteroid ( oral inhale ) , antioxidant ( include multivitamin ) , herbal fiber supplement recent change type formulation hormone replacement therapy ( last 6 month ) 8 . Alcohol intake > 3 drink per day 9 . Untreated hypothyroidism recent change ( within 2 month ) thyroid replacement therapy 10 . Cigarette smoking ( current within last 6 month )
